title: Public Wifi Security: How to Stay Safe Using Free Internet
description: Ubiquitous public wifi at the coffee shop or on the road may be a great convenience, but also an easy way a fraudster can swipe your data. Here's how to be safe when using public wifi.
author: Cheryl Lock

title: Victim of Porch Pirates? What to Do When Packages Are Stolen
description: Porch pirates are busy year-round but especially during the holidays, as more gifts arrive at your door. What to do when your package is stolen from your porch.
author: Kate Dore

title: How to Find Out If Someone Is on Snapchat
description: Want to search for a friend or family member on Snapchat? Here is how you do it.
author: Sheila Olson

title: How to Find Out If Someone Is on Instagram
description: Want to search for a friend or family member on Instagram? Here is how you do itâ€” whether you have an Instagram account or not.
author: Sheila Olson
